thread.title: YVONNE R.
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by YVONNE R.

author: YVONNE R.
title: YVONNE R.
text: Larry was professional and polite. If I had the option I would give Larry a ten star rating. I loved my first shopping experience at Home Zone, and It definitely will not be my last. I will recommend the Home Zone to my friends especially when they see my beautiful bedroom furniture. Thanks Home Zone
